ai-patthana8.49:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, illustrious and confusion,
ai-patthana8.49:1.1_0: A teaching doesn’t give rise to the defilements, conditions for those without defilements.
ai-patthana8.49:1.1_1: A teaching doesn’t give rise to the defilements. Everywhere there is no cause or condition for the corruption of defilements.
ai-patthana8.49:1.1_2: thoughts don’t arise because of corruption, nor because of the defilements don’t arise.
ai-patthana8.49:2.1_0: or corruption, nor by defilements don’t arise ...
ai-patthana8.49:3.1_1: This is the section in brief.
